version_description:
- iOS 9 fixes
- More offers of Surveys and Free Trials
- Removed offers of downloads
- Removed an annoying alert asking for reviews
- Crash/Bug fixes

- Removed download tasks
- Fixed minor bugs
- Stability enhancements

- Removed paid and download tasks.
- More surveys and quizzes offers added.
This Make Money version also fixes some minor bugs providing the most stable version ever.
Update now to get all the improvements!

The app has been completely re-designed and now you can enjoy fantastic tasks to earn money near you.
Earn real cash while you eat out at restaurants or shop at nearby stores.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

We have completely redesigned Make Money!
This new version contains not only a fresh new look, but new contents and exiting surveys!
Plus we fixed bugs and made memory performance improvements.
